# PED::REMOVE_PED_DEFENSIVE_AREA

## Summary
Removes any defensive area given to the ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **BOOL** removeSecondaryDefensiveArea = false: Will remove the secondary/fallback defensive area instead of the primary one

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Ped will no longer get angry when you stay near him.
